name.ingredients: 2 cups chickpeas (soaked overnight or use canned), 1 large onion (finely chopped), 2 tomatoes (pureed), 1 green chili (slit), 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tsp cumin seeds, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp coriander powder, ½ tsp turmeric powder, ½ tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp chana masala powder (optional), 2 tbsp oil, Salt to taste, Fresh cilantro for garnish.
instructions: If using soaked chickpeas, pressure cook them with salt until soft (4-5 whistles). If using canned, drain and rinse.
Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds. Once they splutter, add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and green chili. Sauté for a minute.  Add tomato puree and cook until oil separates.
Add turmeric, coriander powder, red chili powder, and chana masala. Mix well and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add the cooked chickpeas and enough water to reach the desired consistency. Simmer for 15-20 minute
Stir in garam masala and garnish with fresh cilantro.  Serve hot with rice or roti.
